Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the Signature bridge in Delhi by describing it as a "stellar achievement" of the Delhi government.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that one of the photographs posted by the Aam Aadmi Party is not of the Signature bridge, but of the Erasmus bridge in Rotterdam, Netherlands.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the photo is indeed of the Signature bridge.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is of the Signature bridge without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim leaves room for alternative explanations by mentioning that political opponents and social media users pointed out the mistake made by the Aam Aadmi Party.
